mapper.sql: afc.application_no, afc.employee_id, afc.department_id, afc.company_id, afc.fill_card_type, afc.fill_card_time, afc.reason, afc.upload_voucher, afc.approver, afc.operater_time, afc.is_transfer, afc.application_time
mapper.select: select DISTINCT afc.application_no,d.department_name,e.employee_name,afc.application_time,atr.operater_time,afc.fill_card_time, CASE fill_card_type WHEN '1' then '下班补卡' when '2' then '下班补卡' when '3' then '消迟到' when '4' then '消早退' end fill_card_type , CASE afc.approver WHEN '0' then '系统代补勤' WHEN '1' then '系统代补勤' ELSE 'app补勤' end approver from application_fill_card_ afc LEFT JOIN application_total_record_ atr on afc.application_no = atr.application_no and afc.employee_id = atr.application_id and afc.company_id = atr.company_id LEFT JOIN organization.employee_ e on atr.application_id = e.employee_id and atr.company_id = e.company_id LEFT JOIN organization.department_ d on e.department_id = d.department_id and e.company_id = d.company_id where atr.is_complete = '1' and afc.application_no = #{applicationNo}
